CurrentChargesMessageComponent.ABOUT_UPGRADE: Your upgrade will go into effect immediately, and will not affect your current billing charges during the 3-month promotional period.
CurrentChargesMessageComponent.ABOUT_UPGRADE_ANNUAL: Your upgrade will go into effect immediately at no additional charge for the remainder of your current subscription term.
CurrentChargesMessageComponent.INSTRUCTION_TEXT: You can cancel your upgrade at any time prior to your renewal to stay on your current plan.

PAYMENT_INFO.TITLE: Your billing information

REVIEW_ORDER.ABOUT_UPGRADE: Your upgrade will go into effect immediately, and will not affect your current billing charges during the 3-month promotional period.
REVIEW_ORDER.ABOUT_UPGRADE_ANNUAL: Your upgrade will go into effect immediately at no additional charge for the remainder of your current subscription term.
REVIEW_ORDER.INSTRUCTION_TEXT: You can cancel your upgrade at any time prior to your renewal to stay on your current plan.

SUBSCRIPTION_IMPORTANT_INFO.TITLE: Important information about your subscription:
SUBSCRIPTION_IMPORTANT_INFO.BODY: Your subscription starts immediately unless indicated otherwise. If your radio is not receiving the programming you are entitled to, please follow the activation instructions above. For your convenience, all subscriptions automatically renew until canceled. Your renewal will be billed at the then-current rate using the payment method on file. You can cancel your subscription at any time by calling Listener Care at 1-866-635-2349. Your subscription is governed by the SiriusXM Customer Agreement, which can be viewed online. If you would like to receive a copy of the Customer Agreement by mail, you can call 1-866-635-2349.

UPGRADED_PLAN_INFO.DEAL_INFO_AMZ_DOT: Plus a free Echo Dot on us

APPLE.TITLE: Your Apple Music special offer is coming
APPLE.DESCRIPTION: An email with your unique code will be sent to the email address provided. Simply follow the prompts to start enjoying up to 6 months free.
